solution_line_template: Beth still needs to read {total_chapters} - {chapters_read} = <<{total_chapters}-{chapters_read}={chapters_remaining}>>{chapters_remaining} chapters.
She can read 1 chapter in {hours_spent}/{chapters_per_hours} = <<{hours_spent}/{chapters_per_hours}={hours_per_chapter}>>{hours_per_chapter} hours.

Therefore, she will be able to finish reading the remaining chapters in {hours_per_chapter} x {chapters_remaining} = <<{hours_per_chapter}*{chapters_remaining}={total_hours_remaining}>>{total_hours_remaining} hours.
